articles.author: Lora Kolodny
articles.title: Elon Musk offers $1 million a day to entice swing state voters to sign petition - CNBC
articles.description: Elon Musk said he will give away $1 million daily until Election Day to registered voters in swing states who sign his America PAC petition.
articles.content: Tesla CEO and X owner Elon Musk, who supports Republican presidential nominee former U.S. President Donald Trump, gestures as he speaks about voting during an America PAC Town Hall in Folsom, Pennsyl… [+5817 chars]

articles.author: Linette Lopez
articles.title: America is entering a new 'economic supercycle' - Business Insider
articles.description: The US economy is entering a bold new era that economists say will feature more inflation, more growth, and more chaos.
articles.content: No one's going to sound an alarm, blast out a text message, or shoot you an email about it, but the US economy is undergoing a historic shift. We are leaving one long period of expansion what economi… [+11197 chars]
